titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

scopecontent.p: Manuscripts and typescripts of works by Algernon Sydney Logan, Philadelphia author and gentlemen. Among the papers are: "The Image of Air and Other Poems," 1878; "Saul: A Dramatic Poem," 1883; "A Feather from the World's Wing, A Modern Roman," 1885; "Messalina, a Tragedy in Five Acts," 1890; "Not on the Chart: A Novel of Today," 1899; "Amy Warren: A Tale of the Bay Shore," 1900; diaries for "Vistas from the Stream," and "comments on men and events, and opinions upon life and art," 1881-1925. There are also notes for a book about clock making, music scores for violins and piano, miscellaneous poetry and prose.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Bequest of Algernon Sydney Logan (accessioned, 1936)
